definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.chinese: 他有氣無力地揮了揮手。
我有氣無力地握了握他的手說。
公白飛有氣無力地支持它。

sentences.english: 'I'm afraid it IS the trouble you mind, though, ' replied the Toad languidly. 'I can quite understand it.
sentences.chinese: “不過，恐怕你們還是嫌麻煩，”蟾蜍有氣無力地說。

sentences.english: "I thought I had you, " he said, weakly.
sentences.chinese: “我還以爲我贏了你呢，”他有氣無力地說。

sentences.english: After a long sleep, he still felt torpid.
sentences.chinese: 長睡一覺後他仍然覺得有氣無力。

sentences.english: Han Bear's call is weak, but still wakes up a little boy.
sentences.chinese: 憨熊的喊聲有氣無力，但是還是驚醒了一個小男孩兒。
